positive_examples: This is an example of opossum.
We observed opossum in this context.
A typical case of opossum would involve these features.
The concept of opossum applies here.
A marsupial found in the Americas, known for its ability to play dead as a defense mechanism.
negative_examples: This is an example of kangaroo, not opossum.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Kangaroo, or other types of Marsupial

definition: A marsupial native to the Americas, known for playing dead when threatened.
